attributes.action: keep fuschia ward (continuing care) at tolworth hospital open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PCT are decomissioning the continuing care ward at tolworth hospital and are basically evicting the 12 patients all who have late stages of dementia, some with challenging behaviour. This is basically a money saving initiative and does not take into account the lives of elderly people who need the best care and understanding. There has been NO public consultation to my knowlege.
